homeHtml: McKim Design Group is a highly-regarded full-service architecture firm located in San Jose, California.

tabs.title: About
tabs.content:
McKim Design Group is a highly-regarded full-service architecture firm located in San Jose, California.

We work with school districts, commercial developers, residential homeowners, and specialty clients to deliver successful and award-winning projects on schedule and under budget.

tabs.title: People
tabs.content: Our team provides an efficient, enjoyable design environment to tackle your building needs. The personal attention we give to our clients has built a project base that generates 85% of our work from repeat patrons.

tabs.title: Values
tabs.content:
Personal Engagement Matters

We strive to bring you personalized attention to suit your design and building needs.

contactBoxes.title: Explore our work
contactBoxes.caption: We have plenty of past buildings that will impress. Check out some of our projects, or click on our FTP.

contactBoxes.title: Start a project
contactBoxes.caption: Join our team, so we can help bring your vision to life. As a small firm, we make it our number one focus to put you first.

contactBoxes.title: Read about Us
contactBoxes.caption: Want to learn more about what makes McKim Design Group unique? Meet some of our highly skilled team members.
